net.dean.jraw.http

Class RestResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.RestResponse

  • public class RestResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to show the result of a request to a RESTful web service, such as Reddit's JSON API. This class provides automatic parsing of ApiExceptions, as well as quick RedditObject and Listing creation. Note that constructing a RestResponse will not throw an ApiException. This must be done by whomever handles the exception. To see if the response has any errors, use hasErrors() and getError()
